quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Game and Runescape
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, mail, demons. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A basement

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a vampire

options.text: With this power Ill brake every bone in your body.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im an avenger.

In Runescape, you must have a level of 99 on any skill to get a Skill Cape.

questions.question: What is the name of Samus enemies common to nearly every Metroid video game
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Space Pirates

questions.question: What special abilities are unique to Metroids in the video game series Metroid?

options.text: They can suck out your life energy.
They can kill by physical contact.
They can kill by eye contact.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They can suck out your life energy.
